page.title: 18CUSTOMS
page.content: {CUSTOMS-COGGESHALL}A Coggeshall job is a term to describe a silly piece of work that somebody did.It is said that one day the Coggeshall clock struck 11 o 'clock instead of 12 o'clock.When it was heard that Lexdon,Colchester clock had struck 13 o'clock Coggeshall men went to collect the missing strike! There were two windmills next to each other,one was taken down because they thought there wasn't enough wind for two.Coggeshall carnival is held in the summer.A Queen,two Princesses and a flower girl are chosen to be on the carnival float.Other floats are designed by Guides,Scouts,Dancing Groups and the Playgroup.The floats are based on a theme like Nursery Rhymes.In 1985 the theme is'Song Titles'. On Shrove Tuesday the women have a pancake race in Market Hill.
